name: Mint Chocolate Chip
description: A refreshing mint based ice cream with some dark chocolate chunks mixed in.

name: Neapolitan
description: For those who cant decide on one flavor, this ice cream comes with three! vanilla, chocolate and strawberry.

name: Chocolate
description: Chocolate flavored ice cream, nothing more and nothing less.

name: Vanilla
description: The most basic ice cream, but somehow still one of the best.

name: Blueberry Waffle Cone
description: This is definitively the best ice cream, vanilla with blueberry with pieces of waffle cone mixed in, seriously try it.
